item.title: Contributing to the Filecoin spec
item.description: Adding new sections The specification is broken down into 5 levels (#.#.#.#.#). The L1 and L2 numbers in this sequence are determined by the first two directories extending from /src/; for example, /src/systems/filecoin_mining/ resolves to 2.6.. The L3 number is generated by creating an additional directory within a L2 directory, containing its own appropriately formatted index.md. This new directory name must then be added to the entries field of the L2 index.
